sliderData.title: /src/images/Slider/titles/dune.png
sliderData.desc: Join Paul Atreides on his epic quest for vengeance alongside Chani and the Fremen. As he confronts those who destroyed his family, he must choose between love and the fate of the universe, striving to avert a dark prophecy.

sliderData.title: /src/images/Slider/titles/madame.png
sliderData.desc: Forced to confront revelations about her past, paramedic Cassandra Webb forges a relationship with three young women destined for powerful futures...if they can all survive a deadly present.

sliderData.title: /src/images/Slider/titles/death-whisperer.png
sliderData.desc: After Yak, the elder brother returned to his hometown, he must find a way to save his younger sister from a bizarre illness that is causing her to behave differently.

sliderData.title: /src/images/Slider/titles/encanto.png
sliderData.desc: Encanto follows a multigenerational Colombian family, the Madrigals, led by a matriarch whose children and grandchildren—except for Mirabel Madrigal—receive magical gifts from a miracle.
